reviews.headline: Returning
reviews.comments: May be a nice standalone product but pilled like crazy when used with concealer.

reviews.headline: Love this stuff âœ¨
reviews.comments: Makes your undereyes super glowy and brightening!! I love it. I just wish it wasnt so pricey.

reviews.headline: EXCELLENT BEAUTY PRODUCT
reviews.comments: I've been using this glow eye cream for a year, and let me tell you, it's absolutely worth every penny! It genuinely makes you look younger and fresher, and I just love it! (By the way, I'm 56 years old, have fair skin with freckles, and my skin is a bit sensitive.)

reviews.headline: Works great!
reviews.comments: I had little bumps under my eyes so I searched what ingredient to look for and niacinimide showed up. This product was one of the only I could find. It worked within a couple days and my undereye has never looked so smooth. I use it every morning and I feel like I've had it for over a year. Would highly recommend if you have similar undereye issues!

reviews.headline: Ehh
reviews.comments: I thought this product would have been the one because the reviews are good but it caused red irritation and mild swelling. it was pretty because of the shimmer. The packaging says for sensitive skin but my skin was reacting bad. My eyes felt so dry, theres no moisturizing benefits. Also stings a bit so that should have been my first sign

reviews.headline: Good booster
reviews.comments: So I've tried the eye cream on it's own a few times and I didn't love it, the finish was nice but I prefer something a little more hydrating. So I actually mixed this into my Kinship Brightwave eye cream as a booster and MAN! SO much better. Will be repurchasing for that purpose. Total power couple. :)

reviews.headline: Nope
reviews.comments: Was looking forward to this product but everytime I use it it causes painful redness and swelling around my eyes

reviews.headline: Shimmering in the Sun
reviews.comments: This eye cream is so nice! It feels refreshing on the skin and instantly brightens your undereye area with its peach shimmery tint. It's a very subtle shimmer but makes a noticeable difference!

reviews.headline: My Holy Grail!
reviews.comments: I have darker veins under my eyes and I've tried every concealer under the sun to cover them up and no matter what I used the concealer it would crease or dry out my dry skin even more. I gave up until I came across this eye cream. It gives a beautiful glow under the eyes, smoothes out my skin, and hydrates it. Please don't ever discontinue! Perfection!

reviews.headline: Love the color but pills....
reviews.comments: Pills even with my skincare....didn't even get a chance to see how it worked with makeup.

reviews.headline: Caffeine caution
reviews.comments: This is a great moisturizing eye cream that did reduce puffiness. A very unexpected issue was that the caffeine in it caused my muscles around my eye to twitch. This started within a few days of starting it and only ended a couole of days of stopping it. I have absolutely no history of such an issue. To test if the eye cream was the cause, I resumed use afyer several days of stopping and the twitching immediately started up. Very unusual but I'm guessing its the caffeine in the cream.

reviews.headline: Refreshing glow
reviews.comments: I really like this product so far. Love the slight shimmery glow it immediately gives to the under-eye. It has a nice refreshing tingle, making my eyes feel woken up. It also looks beautiful under make-up. I don't find that it creases at all. Some days I use it with just a tinted moisturizer, other days I put a little under eye concealer on top before my foundation and the glow really comes through either way. No irritation so far in the month I've been using it.

reviews.headline: Amazing!! The best eye cream
reviews.comments: I am PICKY when it comes to under eye cream. I have tried so many and I have fallen in love with this one!!!  Keeps my eyes feeling so moisturized as well and bright. The tint isnt too overwhelming like the ole Henriksen Banana Bright. Def prefer this over any eye cream

reviews.headline: Great Eye Cream!
reviews.comments: Okay wow this eye cream is great! The tint helps a lot with dark circles, it is moisturizing and blends well.

reviews.headline: I will buy this forever!!! Love it
reviews.comments:
This is one of the best not only eye creams but brightening eye creams I have ever used you can see such a difference in your dark or puffy under eyes. It's tinted but doesn't lay cakie under your eyes. I just started
Upswing it a couple weeks ago and I saw a difference the first day I wore is and Ill buy it forever now

reviews.headline: Ok Eye Cream
reviews.comments: It's a really pretty eye cream - a champagne color woth a sheen. However, I don't think it was very moisturizing. I also think it gave me some milia and a slight chemical burn under my eyes. Have to a friend and she loved it, though.

reviews.headline: Flawless eye makeup
reviews.comments: I absolutely love the look and feel of this eye cream on its own, but it is a MUST before makeup. The way it layers beautifully under concealer leaves me impressed every time. I will never not have this in my makeup kit, especially now that it comes in a tube - it changed the game!

reviews.headline: Awful
reviews.comments: I LOVE the brightening eye cream in a jar. THIS, however, is horrible. I haven't been able to find my jarred kind so I got this as it was supposed to be the same just different packaging, absolutely not. It PILLS up so BADLY. Literally chunks of orange under my eye. I do not recommend this one.

reviews.headline: Not what I expected
reviews.comments: Unfortunately, I am not a FAN of this new FAB eye product. I am not quite sure what the intentions of it are. For one, I felt line a disco ball when I applied it under my eyes and I used only a pin size drop on each eye. I thought with the added ingredient of sodium hyaluronate that it would have some positive added moisture benefits but nope. This product is a no for me.

faceoff_positive.comments:
It has a great peachy tint to it, a smooth texture that absorbs easily and helps keep the skin around my eye moisturized all day. I can see immediate brightening, and some depuffing. 

For those, like me, with more texture around the eye area though this is a bit too shimmery, it draws attention to the texture versus concealing it.  

If you are dealing with dark circles, mild puffiness, looking for wrinkle care and hydration this is a nice eye cream, if you have bags under your eyes, or more pronounced puffiness this may not be a good fit for you. Which is fine, every product can't work for every concern. 

Thank you FAB team for sending me this to try.
